1912 Photo Art Shop Boston Redsox - $775
One of the best looking postcards in the hobby in my opinion, was in a PSA 5 holder (I crack everything I own but will include flip) which is extremely high for this tough card.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersd/bicem/forsale/large/1912%20Boston%20Red%20Sox.jpg[/IMG]  
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersd/bicem/forsale/large/red%20sox%20back.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ltsgallery/memberfoldersd/bicem/forsale/psa%20flip.jpg[/IMG]
Jeff...Great card, I haven't see one in such nice condition.  Good luck with the sale.
